name: Defender (itch) (RaanShi)
description:
A small game for the ULTRA! Beginners' Jam, done in 5 days.

The forest temple is under attack ! Protect the relic from the hands of the necromancer, while destroying hordes of skeletons !
Do not let yourself get overwhelmed by numbers !

Red skeletons lose to uncharged attacks.
White skeletons lose to charged attacks.
Armored skeletons lose to super-charged attacks.
The whole game is played using the space bar.

Made with Louis and Jasper.

Enjoy !
